name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Elixir Fullstack Engineer with 8 years of full-stack development experience, I excel in agile software development and collaboration, leveraging my expertise in **Elixir**, **Phoenix**, and **LiveView** frameworks. My proficiency extends to modern front-end technologies such as **TailwindCSS** and **daisyUI** to build seamless, high-performance applications. I prioritize code quality and employ best practices to ensure robust application architecture. My development experience includes implementing GDPR compliance, encryption, and key management strategies to enhance data privacy.

In addition to my Elixir focus, I have a strong foundation in cloud services including **AWS** and **Azure**, along with a deep understanding of CI/CD automation and DevOps methodologies. I have successfully led projects that integrate AI/ML capabilities for predictive analytics and intelligent automation. I thrive in communicating technical concepts clearly and possess a product mindset that aligns development efforts with overall business goals.
